nodes.documentation:
@title StdDaoToken 
@dev Currently DaoBase works only with StdDaoToken. It does not support working with 
plain ERC20 tokens because we need some extra features like mint(), burn() and transferOwnership()
 * EVERY token that is used on Thetta should support these operations:
ERC20:
	balanceOf() 
	transfer() 
 * Non ERC20:
	transferOwnership()
	mintFor()
	burnFor()
   startNewVoting()
   finishVoting()
   getBalanceAtVoting()
nodes.name: StdDaoToken
startNewVoting
finishVoting
getBalanceAtVoting
transfer
transferFrom

nodes.documentation: @return amount of total voters
nodes.name: getVotingTotalForQuadraticVoting
mintFor
burnFor

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function should be called only by owner
@dev pause the token
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function should be called only by owner
@dev unpause the token
nodes.name: unpause
